name: Slimz
description:
2D platformer, short project for school, trying out new input system.

Not at all finished.

Pure demo.

Keyboard:

  • left, right: A, D or <, >
  • Jump: W, or ^
  • Select (button): E
  • Menu: R
  • Weapon Switch: SPACE
  • Spear Throw: E

Gamepad:

  • left, right: left stick, arrows
  • Jump: left stick, arrows
  • Select (button): A
  • Menu: L2
  • Weapon Switch: R1 or L1
  • Spear Throw: R2

Made by Borna Bošnjak and Lucija Soldo
